title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. I, pt. 145 - Higher Education Student Financial Aid Program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. I, pt. 145 - Higher Education Student Financial Aid Program

State Regulations

Subpart 145-1 - Regents Scholarship And Fellowship Competitions (§ 145-1.1 to 145-1.19)

Subpart 145-2 - Educational Requirements For Awards And Loans (§ 145-2.1 to 145-2.15)

Subpart 145-3 - General Provisions (§ 145-3.1 to 145-3.2)

Subpart 145-4 - Student Aid To Native Americans (§ 145-4.1 to 145-4.4)

Subpart 145-5 - College Work Study Reimbursement Program (§ 145-5.1 to 145-5.2)

Subpart 145-6 - Regents Awards, Scholarships And Grants In The Professions And Related Fields (§ 145-6.1 to 145-6.6)

Subpart 145-7 - General Provisions (§ 145-7.1 to 145-7.3)

Subpart 145-8 - Repealed

Subpart 145-9 - Scholarships For Academic Excellence (§ 145-9.1 to 145-9.5)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. I, pt. 145

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 207, 210, 215, 602[1], 605a, 610, 661, 665,670-b, 5001, 5002; L. 1988, ch. 425; L. 1996, ch. 309, §§ 11-12;L. 2007, ch. 57; L. 2010, ch. 53; U.S. Code, title 20, §§
1099a,1099a-3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
